◆ GANDIVA_RETURN_ARROW_NOT_OK

#define GANDIVA_RETURN_ARROW_NOT_OK (   astatus)
Value:
do { \
if (!(astatus).ok()) { \
return Status(StatusCode::ArrowError, (astatus).message()); \
} \
} while (0)

◆ GANDIVA_RETURN_FAILURE_IF_FALSE

#define GANDIVA_RETURN_FAILURE_IF_FALSE (   condition,
  status 
)
Value:
do { \
if (!(condition)) { \
Status _status = (status); \
std::stringstream ss; \
ss << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << " code: " << _status.CodeAsString() << " \n " \
<< _status.message(); \
return Status(_status.code(), ss.str()); \
} \
} while (0)

◆ GANDIVA_RETURN_NOT_OK

#define GANDIVA_RETURN_NOT_OK (   status)
Value:
do { \
Status _status = (status); \
if (!_status.ok()) { \
std::stringstream ss; \
ss << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << " code: " << _status.CodeAsString() << " \n " \
<< _status.message(); \
return Status(_status.code(), ss.str()); \
} \
} while (0)
